name: Monero Node
short_description: Pruned Monero full node with restricted RPC for wallets and apps.
description: Pruned Monero full node with restricted RPC for wallets and apps. Monero Node is a self-hosted application focused on cryptocurrency, blockchain, network, crypto. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Monero Node on your home server to pruned monero full node with restricted rpc for wallets and apps without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Monero Node to manage your cryptocurrency workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
